3.1.name: wordpress/notice-boxes-with-shortcodes
3.1.description:
Make nice and noticable boxes like info box, alert box, success box, warning box etc. in your posts using shortcodes. These boxes are very easy to add and very attractive.

Special Features:

  • Close button for the Notice Boxes which can close the box on click
  • Easily make text in the box center aligned.
  • Various kinds of boxes for different messages
  • Add notice boxes using shortcodes (very easy)
  • A special page on your wordpress dashboard with all the help and reference material you need

For more information see Screenshots and FAQ!
